name: GCControllerPlayerIndex
desc: The possible values for controller player indices.

items.name: case indexUnset
items.desc: The default index for a player on a controller.

items.name: case index1
items.desc: Player one is using the controller.

items.name: case index2
items.desc: Player two is using the controller.

items.name: case index3
items.desc: Player three is using the controller.

items.name: case index4
items.desc: Player four is using the controller.
